summary: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.
cast: Maggie Cheung|Tony Chiu-Wai Leung|Ping Lam Siu|Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung|Rebecca Pan|Kelly Lai Chen|Man-Lei Chan|Kam-Wah Koo|Szu-Ying Chien|Paulyn Sun|Roy Cheung|Po-chun Chow|Hsien Yu|Julien Carbon|Laurent Courtiaud|Charles de Gaulle
title: Deseando amar
